column4: hi. i need some help. - > im goin to d/l ubuntu. i plan to use it to setup a ftp, vpn/ssh, and maybe a www server. however, i also want to use it for desktop purposes ie music, surfing, etc. what ver. (server, desktop) should i d/l?
does desktop include the server apps?
you can install any server or desktop apps on any version of ubuntu
the different flavours are just for the base install, you can choose whatever you want afterwards
